description:
syscall: Test SCM credentials on Linux.

This test was previously removed in 087c6e15702e.

messages.text:
I suspect this should be called creds_test.go and have a // +build
line restricting it to Linux. I expect that some of the other Unixes
will be able to use the test too.

Russ

LGTM

creds_unix_test.go seems unnecessarily long.  creds_test.go and the +build
line works.
